Room.Name: Islandia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Islandia Drive, north of Dubson's Armory.
Room.LongDescription: As you walk to the west, you can see the streets lined with various shops catering to just about every need. On the north side of the road is Elaine's Bows, a small elven bow shop where you can purchase the finest elven craftmanship. On the south side of the road is Dubson's Armory for Knights and Steeds, where armor can be fitted for most knights of the Castle and their trusted horses.
